title: Printf (Function)
text:
FUNCTION Printf
This function performs a âformatted printingâ of the value <pValue> points to.

rows.Name: cbsResult
rows.Comment: The buffer, where the result will be returned

rows: The format string used for formatting the value

A pointer to the begin of the piece of memory, where the value to format is
stored.

A __SYSTEM.TYPE_CLASS value describing the type of the value
to format
